Posts.Content: hi babs,am happy to hear you didnt have to have cemo,cos that stuff is nasty lol,its true it as  happen so fast my feet or yours havent touched the ground,i feel the same as you when the cemo stopped i just wanted my life back to normal,i thought the hospital visits would be spaced out more but i still seem to be going more than i would like ,i do same as you try to do small things each day an i feel very pleased with myself if i do well,you do right not to work if you find it too stressfull,you need to  just do what makes you happy ,i seem to try to get on then something happen an knocks me back and thats what iam finding really hard at the min ,hope fully things will start to look better an i can move forward,it would be nice just to be able to simple things without my back hurting or knee,s,we moved a few weeks ago for a new start an am enjoying decorating and choosing things for the new place,please keep in touch would be nice to hear how you get on ,take care norma xxxx
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: hi,i was same at my work i wanted to try more hours because i thought i could cope,but they talked me into less hours to see how i would go,and am glad they did cos i was knackered haha,each week am getting better but still dont think i can do the full 16 hours yet ,there a lot of sweeping an moping and i find that tiring at the moment plus my back playing up ,so think it will be a while before am ok,steady away,my problem is i want it to go faster and a cant ,must learn to slow down
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: Enter your message...hi everyone,i am new to this site,this time last year my life became a roller coaster from finding a lump to have to having my breast removed took 4 weeks an i think i went in to norma mode were i cope an get on with it ,but now its all over i am filled with sadness and fear,most days am ok but it keeps creeping up on me an i end up sobbing,any ideas on what i can do to get through this ,thanks
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: hi kate,thanks so much for anwering me ,i feel the same way has you said a little lost,i will take a look at the site you have mentioned,i do have a few people i chat to a friend of a friend on facebook,she has just gone through the same as me at the same time she is also a nurse who cares for cancer paitences,we have supported each other all the way an we are going to have a meet up once my back is sorted,it helped loads to have some one to chat too and ask questions ,to be honest i am fed up of seeing the hospital and can wait till i dont have to go so much,the big thing i have to do now is make my mind up which recontruction to have wow its a mine field of things to think about lol ,please keep in touch ,take care ,norma xxx
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: .hi debs ,am same love but i also want to get my life back and be normal me again ,still seems a long way off,but the bc nurse said it to me,but i get flustrated and want things too soon lol,it does get easyer  i promise xx you have to try to start doing every day things even if its a short walk an build up to bigger things,are you on facebook ? if you need a good chat or a good moan am here for you ,take care norma xxx
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: hi,i had my left breast removed this time last year,i couldnt have recon right a way ,cos they wasnt sure about all the treatment they were going to give me,am seeing the plasic surgen an a feel same as you,i want a trams flap they keep trying to get me to have a expander but i think sod them i want a tummy tuck aswell too right we have been through hell an back so i want a new boob an belly lol ,you are right humour is a must ,mine didnt go in the lymph nodes an its not hormonal ,if you need a chat about the op an open to any questions xxx norma
Posts.Title: results at last

Posts.Content: hi love ,hope every thing goes well for you an the news is good,i had a scare with my back and had a bone scan ,it came back clear but got a slipped disc,never have i been so happy even if the back is ver painfull xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxal - how long until you feel better??!!

Posts.Content: hi.i am the same as you ,still going to see surgeon to talk about my choice,i would like the trams flap ive read up a lot and it seems to sit well with me,my surgeon keeps saying its my choice but every time i see him he starts going on about the other options an asking me why i want the one i chose,when i tell him my reasons he starts telling me about the other option,so am getting a little flustrated at him,a friend of mine has had the expander and it just waiting to have that removed and a implant fitted,she had her expander fitted at the time of her breast removal,she is very happy with her choice,if that help you,i was thinking about the one were they take skin exc from the shoulder,but just found out my spine is weak under my shoulder,and that option can make your shoulder weaker,so i wont have that ,regards norma xx
Posts.Title: Reconstruction surgery - help!

Posts.Content: hi nina,thanks for been very honest in your post iam wanting the trans flap and have read a lot about it ,but its good to hear from someone who has had surgery very like it ,i still want to go for it,i like the idea that the breast will behave like a natural breast,meaning if a loose weight it will go smaller same if a get bigger,by its self were as with a expander ,implant you would have to go back to hospital to get it filled or drained ,norma xx
Posts.Title: Reconstruction surgery - help!
